testcase.failure:
Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on Do the check button......................................passed And user enter about company details as "Flevo Landscaping B.V." and "56000" and "werkkapitaal" and "Niet Rabobank" and "een bedrijf".passed And user click on start applcation..........................................passed And user click on transaction data..........................................passed And user click on consent transaction data..................................passed And user click on share transaction data....................................passed And user selfupload file "RABO_ExLow-PD_v2.swi".............................passed And user click on complete button...........................................passed And user enter annual figure as "780000" and "670000" and "1200"............passed And user click on nee button................................................passed And user click on next button...............................................passed And user click on view offer button.........................................failed And user click on 1 apply button............................................skipped And user enter data for financing immediately as "Abhinav" and "Jain" and "abhinav.jain@rabobank.nl" and "0647852992".skipped And user click on personal offer............................................skipped
